summary:
**Magic: The Gathering** is a popular card game where players act as powerful wizards, using cards to cast spells and battle each other. It was created in 1993 and has over 50 million players. The game uses different types of cards, like spells, creatures, and artifacts, to gain advantages. Players need "land" cards to cast spells. The goal is usually to reduce an opponent's health to zero.

Magic can be played with physical cards or online. Games can be set up in various ways, either by building a deck from your collection (constructed) or from a random pool of cards (limited). New cards are regularly released, and some rare cards can be very valuable.
title: Magic The Gathering
